titles.title: Hazardous Waste Recycling Tax Credit Act of 1997
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a refundable income tax credit for the recycling of hazardous wastes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/7/1997--Introduced. Hazardous Waste Recycling Tax Credit Act of 1997 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a tax credit of two cents per pound for the recycling of hazardous wastes.
